FlowDefinition.description: "1.This flow is record triggered flow on event object which will triggered when record is created and updated which the some custom entry condition (I,e: Whoid starts with 00Q, whoId is not null ,subject equals meeting and is deleted equals true). 2.Then It will check if the event status is scheduled or rescheduled then it will update the lead status to SAL. If Event status is occured or occurred -rejected by client the then update lead status to SQL. if meeting is deleted then it will update lead status to MQL."
